86.eng-name: Limits and Punishments set by Allah (Hudood)

hadiths.text: Narrated Sahl bin Sa`d:The Prophet (ﷺ) said, "Whoever guarantees me (the chastity of) what is between his legs (i.e. his private parts), and what is between his jaws (i.e., his tongue), I guarantee him Paradise

chapter.eng-name: The superiority of the person who leaves Al-Fawahish
